document_data.mainbody:
Douglas was an apprentice to Booter, Shadow Thieves "official torturer" in Athkatla in the late 14 century DR.
By the , Douglas was still a human youth who began his apprenticeship under Booter in the guilds torture chambers of Aran Linvails hideout located in the Wave Districts docks. The child was tasked with cleaning up expired "guests" and dismembering eager corpses for his master. Despite still working for Booter, Douglas began having reservations about his choice of future vocation.
